Rise facing north, knock the teeth seven times, and thrice call upon the Dipper’s Perfected Hui Ling. Then raise the head and invoke, saying:
“Tai Yi’s nine maidens, scattering forms upon the Mysterious Vault,
Divine radiance revolves and shines, numinous winds emit blossoms.
Left hand grasps the Seven Essences, right hand steers the flying auroras,
Flowing bells undergo nine transformations, ten evolutions and seven songs.
Dividing form into thousands, spitting upon the earth to form rivers—
Whatever is wished or sought, let there be no hardship.
The numinous scripture cycles sevenfold, its might subduing heavenly demons.
Those who comply and revere shall become immortals; those who oppose the Dao shall perish.”

When finished, swallow qi thirty-four times and stop.

This is the Way of the Seven Cycles of the Divine Continent, the method of myriad transformations of radiance, the jade formula for refining form and transmuting into immortals. Practicing it for nine years, the nine consorts feast upon radiance, together ascending into flight. The body emits wondrous light, the face reflects a golden countenance, the Seven Stars entwine the body, and one rides the clouds to ascend at dawn.

The Seven Cycles of Transformation are the Way of the Supreme Thearch of Purple Dawn, who first studied the jade-perfected refining and transforming Dao. The Nine Heavens’ Father and Mother bestowed upon him the scripture of the Seven Cycles of Radiance Transformation, untying knots and releasing obstructions, dispersing the Seven Mysteries, enabling the refinement of form and alteration of body to ascend to the Jade Palace. Through profound cultivation and accumulated resonance with the Primordial Heaven, he attained the rank of Supreme Thearch and received the title Purple Dawn. This Way is lofty and wondrous; it must not be recklessly transmitted. To carelessly divulge this treasure text brings calamity upon one’s ancestors and oneself, subjecting them to ten sufferings and eight poisons, with no deliverance for ten thousand kalpas. Those of destined bone who obtain this divine scripture, keeping it secret and practicing it, shall attain perfection in due time.

**First: Cloud Essence Jade Radiance Flying Mystery Life Talisman**
Perform the ritual by writing in vermilion on blue paper and ingesting it; write in vermilion on blue silk and wear it. The essence of the Five Auroras enables knowledge of the Upper Clarity’s Golden Flower of the Five Auroras. Practicing it for seven years, one shares the radiance of the luminous net.

**Second: Yin-Yang Jade Radiance Opening Brilliance Numinous Talisman**
Perform the ritual by writing in vermilion on blue paper and ingesting it; write in vermilion on blue silk and wear it. This is the essence of the sun and moon’s two radiant forms, enabling knowledge of the two radiant forms’ essence, concealing radiance and hiding form. Practicing it for eighteen years, one ascends to the Purple Court.

**Third: Radiance-Transforming Illuminating Spirit Seven Cycles Refining Essence Jade Talisman**
Perform the ritual by writing in blue on white paper and ingesting it; write in blue on white silk and wear it. This is the essence of the Great Yang, enabling knowledge of its transformations, refining the body and altering form, radiance and qi penetrating emptiness, equal to fire in brilliance. Practicing it for seven years, one ascends to the Imperial Court.

**Fourth: Life River Nine Sources Treasure Chapter Talisman**
Perform the ritual by writing in ink on white paper and ingesting it; write in ink on white silk and wear it. This is the qi of the Vast Waves’ Jade Essence, enabling knowledge of the Nine Rivers’ inner names, transforming and dividing form, ascending to roam the Nine Sources, descending to sink into the water spirits. Practicing it for five years, ten thousand transformations are immediately accomplished.

**Fifth: Dragon Embryo Preserving Essence Talisman**
Perform the ritual by writing in yellow on white paper and ingesting it; write in yellow on white silk and wear it. This is the qi of the Nine Transformations of Dragon Essence, enabling knowledge of the Dragon Embryo, transforming radiance and ascending cliffs, ascending to roam the Nine Mysteries, descending to sport at the Nine Doubts. Practicing it for five years, one remains undiminished through kalpas.

**Sixth: Dissolving Form Seven Cycles Talisman**
Perform the ritual by writing in blue on yellow paper and ingesting it; write in blue on yellow silk and wear it. This is the essence of the primordial coagulation of thunder and lightning. This Way is supremely wondrous, dividing shadows and dispersing form, streaming light into ten thousand transformations, merging with the Perfected in darkness.

**Seventh: Seven Primes Radiant Jade Talisman**
Perform the ritual by writing in vermilion on blue paper and ingesting it; write in vermilion on blue silk and wear it. This is the essence of the Seven Stars, enabling transformations, concealment, and ascension to the Jade Court of Radiance.

The above seven transformation talismans were bestowed upon the Supreme Thearch of Purple Dawn by the Nine Heavens’ Father and Mother, comprising the Way of transforming radiance and refining form, a secret of the Great Perfected and a treasure of the Nine Heavens. Through their cultivation, the Purple Dawn Lord attained the exalted title of Imperial Thearch. This Way is revered and wondrous, the origin of all scriptures. When the seven cycles are complete, one’s celestial perfected nature becomes equal to the heavens. Without a body of golden bones and jade constitution, one may not partake in or hear of it. Only those whose mystical name is Dong Hua and whose green character is Shang Qing may behold this wondrous text and secretly practice it. In accordance with the Great Perfected’s regulations, one may receive three transmissions in seven thousand years; if a suitable person appears within seven hundred years, transmission may also be granted. The recipient must offer one catty of true pearls, thirty-two feet of green damask, and five taels of superior gold as a pledge to the Nine Heavens’ vow of secrecy. Coveting wealth and admiring the Dharma incurs the same sin as greed; lightly valuing treasures and receiving scriptures sincerely moves the Jade Thearch. Cinnabar is used to express resonance, and trust is used to clarify the heart. Without a sincere heart, why engage in superficial admiration? Such learning is like sinking into a ten-thousand-fathom abyss while hoping to climb the path of clouds—how distant it is! Lightly valuing wealth and revering the Dao, though the Dao may be secluded and silent, dark scrutiny will reveal it, leading to the steps of ascending the heights and attaining the Perfected through proper means. This text is now compiled and transmitted to those destined for immortality; it is not bestowed upon the mediocre. To carelessly divulge this treasure text and expose it to the Upper Perfected brings retribution upon one’s seven generations of ancestors and parents, who are consigned to the offices of ghostly officials, made to transport the stones of Mount Meng to fill the River of Night. For ten thousand kalpas, they are reborn outside the human realm, their bodies subjected to the tortures of wind and blades. The scripture is naturally lost, and immortality is utterly unattainable.

chunks.original_text: 受者秘而慎焉。 凡上清宝经三百卷，玉诀九千篇，符图七千章，皆出元始高上玉帝，禀承自然之章，玄古之道。 学者得其篇目，立登真皇。 其道秘在九天之上，大有之宫，相传玉文，以付上相青童君，封於玉华青宫； 逮至元景元年，撰集一通，以封西城山中。 旧科皆经万劫一传，自六天罢退，三道正明，运度相促，至道应行，改科七千年听传，若七百年内有至心，骨相应玄，录字上清者，皆得依盟而传。 有得此经，克成真人，依次修行，理无不足，道无不成，炁足道备，则白日升晨。 太帝君命扶桑大帝旸谷神王所撰三十一卷独立之诀，皆备天地之运，黄庭玉景，调理五藏，通畅神关，诵之万遍，亦得飞腾。 凡学之士，皆当先受明科，拔罪赎过，披解七玄，令罪灭九阴，福生上清，然后得投金简玉札，奏名青宫，受豁落七元、流金火铃、金真玉光金玄羽章，威制六天三天正法、消魔上经。 次有九真八道灵书紫文，服御日月招致云霞，黄素品格四十四方，曲素诀辞五行招魂，策虚驾无紫度炎光，飞行羽经蹑行七元，三九素语祝命五方，黄炁阳精日月洞明，金当玉佩二景混生，三元玉检固神宝真，神州七转八变□天，契络天地齐回昼冥。 乃得披诵大洞真经三十九章，拔度七祖，受生南宫。 雌一玉检五老宝经，金华玉房隐朝三元。 大有妙经洞玄素灵，太丹隐书五籍宝神。 三奇宝文，万遍升玄，兼御灵飞藏景录形，七星移度披天三关，隐地八术丹景道精，七十二变万化立成，混合帝一五神胎生。 备行众经，道满炁盈，上下相须，大小齐灵，登斋入室，幽思念生，真神降感，三元诣房，越行错缩，神散炁零，空体独学，若魂无形，苟欲贪足，不从本根，轻披三宝，摇动九天，三司所执，结罪四明，不出三年，身没鬼官。 不自忿己，反怨道经，非道负人，自由诸身。 至学之士，参受宝文，当案科品，以次修行，万无不感，理无不全，道无不降，形无不仙，万遍道备，白日升天。 上经三百首，上真各有所禀，亦不悉备，后来积学，亦不得齐於太真之所修也。 世人多混秽炁炁正，故学有次序阶级之科。 若修大帝所撰三十一卷，道备然后自得适其所好尔。 始学之士，不得径造所欲，以亏明科，其考甚重，深各慎之。 小有天王曰：凡修三十一卷，以得次第，丹清上彻，太帝自当遣太极真人，更授子众经俯仰之格。 学者勤精苦念，每使无亏，克得飞腾游宴玉京也。 凡受上经，当检口慎言，不得背彼向此，道说经文，疑惑天真，宣露世间，毁坏同学，冒名贤人，始能胜己，虚诞天灵，攻伐师友，谋反不道，自言有道洞备妙经。 如此皆四司所执，奏言太帝，七祖父母收结鬼官，长闭地狱，身被风刀之考，万不得仙。 学者各宜慎之。 四极科中品曰：经不受，师窃天宝，受无盟信，忽天道。 若於因缘得经，世无经师，得依科赉信诣绝岩之峰，隐盟而受。 若有经师，便诣师盟度，得经而不盟受，轻妄修行，触忤天灵，妄说经目，语於凡学之人者，此考甚重，四极四司之官所执，七祖父母充积夜之河无极之役，身被见事之拷，死充十苦八难，吞火抱剑，以谢轻说经之责，受者明慎科制。 洞真上清神州七转七变舞天经竟

Let the recipient guard it in secrecy and reverence. All the three hundred scrolls of the Supreme Clarity’s precious scriptures, the nine thousand chapters of jade instructions, and the seven thousand sections of talismanic diagrams originate from the Most High Jade Emperor of the Primordial Beginning, who received the natural writ and the Dao of remote antiquity. Should a practitioner obtain even the titles of these texts, they shall ascend at once to the rank of Perfected Sovereign. The Dao is concealed in the Nine Heavens above, within the Palace of Great Existence, where the jade texts are transmitted and entrusted to the Supreme Minister, the Azure Lad of the Blue Palace. Sealed within the Jade Flower Azure Palace, they remained until the first year of the Yuanjing era, when a complete compilation was made and sealed within the Western City Mountain. According to the old statutes, these texts were transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas. Yet after the Six Heavens were abolished and the Three Ways were rectified, the cosmic reckoning hastened, and the Great Dao was destined to spread. The statutes were thus revised to permit transmission every seven thousand years. If within seven hundred years there appears one of utmost sincerity, whose bones and countenance accord with the mysterious, whose name is recorded in the registers of Supreme Clarity, they may receive the texts in accordance with the covenant.

One who obtains these scriptures and succeeds in becoming a Perfected may proceed through the practices in proper order; nothing in principle will be lacking, and nothing in the Dao will fail to be accomplished. When qi is full and the Dao complete, one ascends at dawn in broad daylight. The Great Emperor commanded the Solar Valley Divine King of Fusang to compile thirty-one independent scrolls of instructions, which encompass the movements of Heaven and Earth, the Jade Radiance of the Yellow Court, the regulation of the five viscera, and the free flow of the spirit gates. Reciting them ten thousand times also enables one to soar aloft.

All who undertake this study must first receive the luminous statutes, expiate their transgressions, and redeem their faults, thereby dissolving the seven mysteries and extinguishing their sins in the Nine Yin. Blessings then arise in Supreme Clarity, after which one may present a memorial on golden tablets and jade slips to inscribe their name in the Azure Palace. They shall then receive the liberation of the Seven Primes, the Flowing Gold Fire Bells, the Golden Perfection Jade Radiance Golden Mystery Feathered Chapters, the authoritative methods of the Six Heavens and Three Heavens, and the *Scripture for Subduing Demons*.

Next come the Nine Perfected and Eight Ways’ numinous books of purple writ, which enable the ingestion of sun and moon and the summoning of clouds and rosy dawn. There are the forty-four ranks of the Yellow Plain’s standards, the five-phase soul-summoning incantations of the Curved Silk, the strategies for riding the void and steering the Purple Passage of Flaming Light, the *Feathered Scripture of Flight* and the *Seven Primes’ Treading Steps*, the twenty-seven plain words for invoking the five directions, the Yellow Qi and Yang Essence that illumine sun, moon, and caverns, the Golden Pendants and Jade Girdles that blend the Two Radiant Ones, the Three Primes’ jade tallies that secure the treasure of the spirit, and the seven transformations and eight mutations of the Divine Continent’s *Seven Revolutions and Seven Changes Dancing Heaven Scripture*, which harmonize Heaven and Earth and synchronize day and night.

Only then may one recite the thirty-nine chapters of the *Great Cavern Perfected Scripture*, deliver one’s seven ancestors, and be reborn in the Southern Palace. There are the *Single Jade Tally and Five Elders’ Precious Scripture*, the *Golden Flower Jade Chamber* where the Three Primes are concealed and courted, the *Wondrous Scripture of Great Existence and Cavern Mystery Plain Numinosity*, the *Five Registers’ Treasure Spirit of the Concealed Elixir*, and the *Three Marvels’ Precious Writ*. Reciting these ten thousand times enables ascent to the Mystery, along with the ingestion of the *Numinous Flight*, the recording of one’s form in the *Hidden Radiance*, the traversal of the Three Celestial Passes through the shifting of the Seven Stars, the Eight Arts of Concealment and the Elixir Radiance’s Dao Essence, the seventy-two transformations and myriad transmutations that are instantly accomplished, and the fusion with the Imperial Unity and the birth of the Five Spirit Embryos.

When all scriptures are practiced to completion, the Dao is full and qi abundant; above and below mutually sustain one another, and great and small are equally numinous. Entering the chamber to fast and meditate, one’s profound thoughts arise, and the Perfected Spirits descend in response. The Three Primes visit the chamber, but if one’s steps falter or retreat, spirit disperses and qi scatters. To practice in an empty body alone, like a soul without form, or to covet fulfillment without following the root, to carelessly reveal the Three Treasures and shake the Nine Heavens—such acts are seized by the Three Offices, and sins are bound in the Four Luminaries. Within three years, one’s body is consigned to the offices of ghostly officials. Should one fail to resent one’s own faults and instead blame the Dao and its scriptures, not the Dao betraying the person but the person betraying themselves.

Those who earnestly study and receive the precious texts must follow the statutes and proceed in order. There is nothing that will not respond, nothing in principle that will not be perfected, no Dao that will not descend, no form that will not become immortal. When the Dao is complete after ten thousand recitations, one ascends to Heaven in broad daylight. The three hundred chapters of the supreme scriptures are each bestowed upon the Perfected according to their capacity; not all are fully provided. Later diligent learners cannot equal the practices of the Great Perfected. The world is filled with impure qi, and the correct qi is obscured, hence the study of the Dao proceeds by sequence and rank.

If one practices the thirty-one scrolls compiled by the Great Emperor and completes the Dao, one may then pursue what one desires. Beginners must not leap directly to their aspirations, lest they violate the luminous statutes, for the consequences are severe. Beware and take heed.

The Lesser Existence Heavenly King states: One who practices the thirty-one scrolls in proper order, with the cinnabar purity ascending to the heights, shall be visited by the Great Emperor, who will dispatch the Perfected of the Supreme Ultimate to further instruct them in the postures and protocols of the various scriptures. Those who diligently and painstakingly cultivate without lapse shall be able to soar and wander in the Jade Capital.

All who receive the supreme scriptures must guard their speech and be cautious in their words. They must not turn their backs on one to face another, nor discuss the scriptures’ contents, thereby confusing the Heavenly Perfected. To reveal them to the world, slander fellow practitioners, falsely claim the names of the worthy, belittle those more advanced, deceive the numinous powers, attack teachers and friends, plot rebellion, or claim to possess the wondrous completeness of the cavern scriptures—such acts are seized by the Four Offices and reported to the Great Emperor. One’s seven generations of ancestors and parents are bound to the offices of ghostly officials, eternally confined to the earth prisons, their bodies subjected to the tortures of wind and blades. They shall never attain immortality. Let all practitioners beware.

The statutes of the Four Poles state: One who does not receive the scriptures but steals the Heavenly Treasures, or receives them without covenant or faith, spurns the Heavenly Dao. If one obtains scriptures through karmic conditions but there is no master in the world, one may proceed according to the statutes, bearing a pledge to a secluded peak to receive them in secret. If a master exists, one must visit them to receive the covenant and transmission. To obtain scriptures without receiving the covenant, to practice recklessly, offend the numinous powers, or idly discuss the scriptures’ titles with the uninitiated—such acts incur severe consequences. They are seized by the officials of the Four Poles and Four Offices, and one’s seven generations of ancestors and parents are consigned to the endless labor of filling the River of Night. Their bodies endure the visible tortures, and after death, they suffer the Ten Torments and Eight Difficulties, swallowing fire and embracing swords, to atone for the crime of carelessly discussing the scriptures. Let the recipient clearly heed the statutes and regulations.

Here ends the *Seven Revolutions and Seven Changes Dancing Heaven Scripture of the Supreme Clarity’s Divine Continent*.
